label: Illuminance level
description: Allow reading the relative brightness intensity from devices that support it

brightnessIntensity.label: Illuminance level
brightnessIntensity.description: A numerical representation of the relative brightness intensity taken by the device. Example references: 0 = complete dark, 1 = overcast night, 2 = full moon, 3 = deep twilight, 4 = twilight, 5 = very dark day, 6 = overcast day, 7 = full daylight
